dict.string:
VNC Server
Connect it with any image ie. with output from Render in Image patch.
Server port is standard VNC port 5900.
To connect use your favourite VNC client from PC/iPhone/Mac.
On the Mac you can use vncviewer: $ port install vncviewer $ vncviewer -viewonly -encodings 'raw' localhost
You can use other encodings ie. tight.
This version is not optimized.
(c) 2010 QuartzComposer.com, Mirek Rusin <mirek@me.com> GPL
Input image, most of the time you want to connect it with Render in Image output
